alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:57PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Baldwin County through 645 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Loxley. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Robertsdale, Loxley and Silverhill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
